basic.heading: Buttons of type basic
basic.text: The basic button has no background or border. The text color is determined by the color property. This button also lacks padding left and right.

outlined.heading: Buttons of type outlined
outlined.text: Outlined buttons consist of a border colored by the color property. The content(icon/text) will also be colored by the color property.

filled.heading: Type filled
filled.text: Buttons with type filled and in three different colors.

textWithIcon.heading: Buttons with both text and icon
textWithIcon.text: You can choose to have both text and an icon. You can also switch positions of the text and icon by setting reverse to true.

icon.heading: Button with icon only
icon.text: This is a button with only an icon. This is the only button that will be rendered as a square.

size.heading: Size
size.text: Different sizes ranging from sm to lg

sizewithicon.heading: Size with icons
sizewithicon.text: Different sizes ranging from sm to lg with icons

disabled.heading: Disabled buttons
disabled.text: A button with the data-attribute disabled set to true will be greyed out and cursor set to not-allowed.

toggle.heading: Togglebuttons
toggle.text: When pressing a toggle-button the text color will go from black to primary to indicate it being toggled.

togglewithinterchangable.heading: Togglebuttons with interchangable labels and icons
togglewithinterchangable.text: When pressing a toggle-button label and/or the icon will be changed to indicate the action.

type.heading: Type
type.text: Use the type attribute to help define the action of the button.
